global.title: Portfolio of Fernando J. - Web Developer
global.description: This is my portfolio website, here you can see my projects, technologies, purposes and more.

curiosity.title: Curiosity about programming
curiosity.description: Long before deciding for my future, I was curious about programming and I started to do small projects like some modding games, or creating small websites.

education.title: Higher Education in Web Development
education.description: Most recent official education, focused mostly on web development and related technologies.

atlas.title: Working for Atlas Cloud S.L.
atlas.description: After doing an intership at Atlas Cloud, I was able to start working for them as a full stack developer. I have primarily worked with Salesforce, Laravel, VueJS and SQL.

carnets.title: Carnets
carnets.description: Carnets is a web application that allows users to create presentation cards for their Twitch channels.

purposes.title: Purposes
purposes.description: One of my hobbies is to learn languages, it's very useful as well as very enjoyable.
